text: Well hell stranger, ain't I got a tale for you!
There I was, noose around my neck at the gallows, soon to be departed.
Then right beneath my boots, a god darned vortex somethin or other opened up!
If that ain't fate then I don't know what is!
Granted now I don't know where I am, or how to get back...
Or really much of anything I reckon...
You aren't an angel are you?
